Package cop3330.ui

package cop3330.ui
Optional. Contains the user interface classes responsible for presenting and managing the visual components of the student and course information system.

This package includes the following primary classes:

  • LatestStudentListUI — Provides a GUI for displaying, filtering, and managing a list of students.
  • LatestCourseListUI — Provides a GUI for displaying all courses or the courses registered by a specific student, with options to add or register courses.

These classes handle user interaction and presentation logic using Swing components, coordinating with the controller layer to retrieve and manipulate data.

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LatestCourseListUI
    The LatestCourseListUI class provides a graphical user interface window that displays a list of courses in a table format.
    LatestStudentListUI
    The LatestStudentListUI class provides a graphical user interface window for displaying, filtering, and managing a list of students.
